body:
I ran e2e tests against docker 1.7.0-rc2 release, found a bunch of issues. Here is one I think it belongs to kubernetes for sure. 

1) ResizeNode test failed, the machine is removed from instance group:

```
| e2e-test-dawnchen-master      | us-central1-b | RUNNING | 10.240.156.229 | 104.154.64.108  |
+-------------------------------+---------------+---------+----------------+-----------------+
| e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-vxvg | us-central1-b | RUNNING | 10.240.146.175 | 104.197.40.212  |
+-------------------------------+---------------+---------+----------------+-----------------+
| e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-wkpa | us-central1-b | RUNNING | 10.240.211.202 | 104.197.91.127  |
```

But kubectl get nodes still returns 3 ndoes:

```
$ kubectl get nodes
NAME                            LABELS                                                 STATUS
e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-5l11   kubernetes.io/hostname=e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-5l11   NotReady
e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-vxvg   kubernetes.io/hostname=e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-vxvg   Ready
e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-wkpa   kubernetes.io/hostname=e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-wkpa   Ready
```

This might be caused by the new docker binary I am testing against here. This is not the issue I am filing here.

2) Now networking test is running later, I noticed that the test is putting a pod on each node:  nettest-gwtc4 on node e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-5l11 

```
Networking 
  should function for intra-pod communication
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/networking.go:203
[BeforeEach] Networking
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/framework.go:47
STEP: Creating a kubernetes client
>>> testContext.KubeConfig: /usr/local/google/home/dawnchen/.kube/config
STEP: Building a namespace api object
STEP: Waiting for a default service account to be provisioned in namespace
INFO: Waiting up to 2m0s for service account default to be provisioned in ns e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626
INFO: Service account default in ns e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626 found. (39.623658ms)
[BeforeEach] Networking
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/networking.go:51
STEP: Executing a successful http request from the external internet
[It] should function for intra-pod communication
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/networking.go:203
STEP: Creating a service named "nettest" in namespace "e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626"
STEP: Creating a webserver (pending) pod on each node
INFO: Created pod nettest-gwtc4 on node e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-5l11
INFO: Created pod nettest-0awly on node e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-vxvg
INFO: Created pod nettest-0qbe9 on node e2e-test-dawnchen-minion-wkpa
STEP: Waiting for the webserver pods to transition to Running state
INFO: Waiting up to 5m0s for pod nettest-gwtc4 status to be running
INFO: Waiting for pod 'nettest-gwtc4' in namespace 'e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626' status to be '"running"' (found phase: '"Pending"', readiness: false) (41.642383ms)
INFO: Waiting for pod 'nettest-gwtc4' in namespace 'e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626' status to be '"running"' (found phase: '"Pending"', readiness: false) (5.083175533s)
INFO: Waiting for pod 'nettest-gwtc4' in namespace 'e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626' status to be '"running"' (found phase: '"Pending"', readiness: false) (10.125042821s)
INFO: Waiting for pod 'nettest-gwtc4' in namespace 'e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626' status to be '"running"' (found phase: '"Pending"', readiness: false) (15.166074216s)
INFO: Waiting for pod 'nettest-gwtc4' in namespace 'e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626' status to be '"running"' (found phase: '"Pending"', readiness: false) (20.207430126s)
INFO: Waiting for pod 'nettest-gwtc4' in namespace 'e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626' status to be '"running"' (found phase: '"Pending"', readiness: false) (25.248069231s)
INFO: Waiting for pod 'nettest-gwtc4' in namespace 'e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626' status to be '"running"' (found phase: '"Pending"', readiness: false) (30.289449349s)
INFO: Waiting for pod 'nettest-gwtc4' in namespace 'e2e-tests-nettest-2a0e3f3f-102f-4ca9-b8a0-118d9da29626' status to be '"running"' (found phase: '"Pending"', readiness: false) (35.330526598s)

```

I haven't checked networking code in detail yet, not sure the issue is test itself, or scheduler issue. cc/ @lavalamp since you recently changed this. 

cc/ @quinton-hoole

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

milestone.description: Issues that need to be resolved for v1.0 of Kubernetes.
milestone.title: v1.0

title: e2e networking test schedule a pod to a NotReady node
